Health care was the single largest driver of Q3 consumption growth.

Two names to watch:

‚Ä¢ $HIMS as the cash-pay healthcare layer benefiting from rising spend & demand for direct access outside the insurance system.

2026 Market Predictions | Live Q&A

Wanted to let you all know that Daniel and I will be livestreaming on the Futurum Equities YouTube channel with a special 2026 Market Predictions show where we‚Äôll talk through what we expect to happen in the markets next year.

We‚Äôll start streaming at 10:30 AM ET. We do a live Q&A during the last 5‚Äì10 minutes of each episode, so come with questions!

This GDP print is huge for $AMZN. 

Consumption-driven growth lowers downside risk for Amazon by keeping retail and advertising demand steady while AWS continues to invest heavily in AI.
U.S. SAYS TARIFFS ON CHINA-MADE SEMICONDUCTORS WILL STAY AT 0% THROUGH JUNE 2027

So Singapore wasn‚Äôt actually the world‚Äôs biggest AI buyer of $NVDA chips after all.

Who could‚Äôve guessed.

$CIFR acquired a 200 MW Ohio site called Ulysses with secured power and PJM access which marks its first expansion outside Texas.

This positions Cipher as a landlord in the AI Utility era by owning power and sites others will rent.
This image shows the top 10 AI chatbot and tool websites in the U.S. for November.

ChatGPT still dominates usage but Gemini is the only platform showing meaningful share gains.

$GOOGL distribution advantage is starting to show up in traffic.

$NVDA is partnering with SK Hynix & Phison on a new ‚ÄúAI SSD‚Äù (Storage Next) built to sit between DRAM/HBM & traditional storage. 

The goal is to keep GPUs fed as inference becomes a memory bottleneck with a prototype targeted for 2026.

$AMZN ad business now generates ~$177M per day.

It‚Äôs the only platform that monetizes users when they‚Äôre already buying.

$NVO said the FDA approved the first oral GLP-1 pill for weight management in the U.S. with trial data showing ~16.6% mean weight loss with adherence.

The company expects a U.S. launch in early 2026.

$AMZN profit engine is AWS and its growth engine is advertising and together they‚Äôre now generating ~$50B per quarter.

As those high-margin businesses grow as a share of revenue and retail efficiency improves through automation, Amazon is set up to be a Mag 7 leader in 2026.

The fact this isn‚Äôt priced at zero is alarming.

If it ever happens then China wins the AI arms race by default.

Google $GOOG is acquiring data center and energy infrastructure startup Intersect for $4.75B, with the deal expected to close in 1H '26.

Intersect's operations will remain separate from Google, and the acquisition will help bring data center generation capacity online faster.
Alibaba $BABA is said to be considering purchasing between 40,000 to 50,000 of AMD's $AMD MI308 GPUs, as reports suggest its China-compliant GPU is nearing a commercial rollout.

The GPU as a service market is projected to rise more than 8X over the next decade, from ~$30 billion in 2025 to $251 billion by 2034.

There are some concerns that #Tesla may have put in a short-term top.

#TSLA still remains above its 8-day moving average, keeping the broader trend intact, but losing momentum makes upside harder in the near term.

Stay above key short-term levels, and it‚Äôs still constructive; lose them, and it becomes a trim-and-manage situation, not an all-in bet‚Äîespecially during thin, holiday trading where follow-through is harder to find.

üì∫ DON‚ÄôT CHASE THIS HOLIDAY RALLY
$SPX $QQQ $IWM

The market is in a quiet holiday grind higher, not a time to force trades.

Manage what you have, keep stops tight, take easy gains when they‚Äôre there, and don‚Äôt chase extended moves‚Äîespecially in gold $GLD and silver $SLV, where the money has already been made.

Novo Nordisk $NVO says the FDA approved the once daily Wegovy pill (oral semaglutide 25 mg), the first oral GLP 1 for weight management in the US. In the OASIS 4 trial, mean weight loss was 16.6% with adherence. 

The company expects a US launch in early Jan 2026.

AOT Software Platform ETF Expected to Launch December 23rd, 2025 $AOTS

Software platforms provide the foundation or infrastructure upon which software applications can be built and run. From an investment standpoint, software platforms offer the potential for many strategic business advantages including: 

‚Ä¢Low marginal cost - Software platforms are scalable businesses that support high margins and revenue growth at scale with virtually no marginal costs or the need for debt financing. 

‚Ä¢Competitive moats - Low incremental sales costs means more revenue can be used to innovate, build new products, and provide increased utility to customers, creating the potential for a sustainable competitive advantage.

‚Ä¢Recurring revenue models - Most software platforms operate under subscription-based models (SaaS), generating recurring revenues with high customer retention.  The SaaS model is also tariff-resistant. 

‚Ä¢AI and innovation tailwinds - Artificial intelligence and applications such as generative AI are creating new opportunities for software companies, as investor focus shifts from hardware infrastructure to software applications. 

One of the critical strategic advantages for software platforms is scalability. While the marginal cost of traditional goods increases with production due to resource constraints, the marginal cost of digital goods trends to zero as production scales.  As a result, investing in software platforms creates an attractive  opportunity for investors. 

Investors will soon be able to invest in this thematic, cross sector opportunity through the AOT Software Platform ETF, expected to launch on the New York Stock Exchange on December 23rd, 2025. Stay tuned for more information!

ETFAC-5037726-12/25
 
The registration statement for the Fund has been declared effective by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (‚ÄúSEC‚Äù). However, the Funds have not yet commenced operations. Shares of the Funds are expected to begin trading on or about December 23, 2025, subject to market conditions.

Investing involves risk.  Principal loss is possible.
